articles.author: Ifreke Inyang
articles.title: World Cup 2022 final: Prize money for Argentina, France revealed - Daily Post Nigeria
articles.description: The total prize money for teams that participated in the 2022 World Cup in Qatar adds up to $440 million. There were 32 teams at the tournament - 13 countries from Europe, five African teams, four North American countries, four countries from South America an…
articles.content:
The total prize money for teams that participated in the 2022 World Cup in Qatar adds up to $440 million.
There were 32 teams at the tournament – 13 countries from Europe, five African teams, four N… [+779 chars]
